content: is no leash gap in the pattern for the very reason that everyone has a slightly different set up for walking their dog and what might suit my requirements is rather different for someone else i d love to see your project on ravelry please use tags #ginniesimplesnood #ginnieglam #ginniegear on other social media and make sure to follow my muse @ginnie_the_greyt ~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~ 2
